title: Repeals subdivision 3 of section 727 of the real property tax law relating to petitions for review of the assessment on property
summary: Repeals a provision of the real property tax law relating to petitions for review of the assessment on property.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          119

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. CAHILL, JAFFEE, COOK, CASTRO, AMEDORE, GUNTHER --
         Multi-Sponsored  by  -- M. of A. BRENNAN, BURLING, McDONOUGH, SCARBOR-
         OUGH, TEDISCO -- read once and referred to the Committee on Real Prop-
         erty Taxation

       AN ACT to repeal subdivision 3 of section 727 of the real  property  tax
         law, relating to petitions for review of the assessment on property

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 3 of section 727 of the real property  tax  law
    2  is REPEALED.
    3    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.







        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD00886-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to repeal subdivision 3 of section 727 of the real property tax law, relating to petitions for review of the assessment on property
